entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
